info.name: Flora
info.attribution:
The game layout, game board, game piece designs, and library image were done by LawDawg, with edits by RaphaelAlvez, and are released to the Public Domain by CC0.

The room background and card back are from https://pixabay.com/ and are available under the Pixabay License:
 -https://pixabay.com/photos/hydrangea-flowers-pink-hydrangea-3659614/
 -https://pixabay.com/illustrations/rose-graphic-flower-deco-4372048/

The card face artwork is all in the public domain and available from the following sources:

Buttercup - http://www.clker.com/clipart-14008.html
Camellia - http://www.clker.com/clipart-26556.html
Carnation - http://www.clker.com/clipart-26550.html
Crocus - http://www.clker.com/clipart-14014.html
Dahlia - http://www.clker.com/clipart-26857.html
Daisy - http://www.clker.com/clipart-clip-art.html
Lily - http://www.clker.com/clipart-26617.html
Periwinkle - http://www.clker.com/clipart-14022.html
Tulip - http://www.clker.com/clipart-14030.html
Rose - https://freesvg.org/outlined-rose-image
info.description: Create sets of floral cards in tiled sequences to connect the same species of flower.  Highest score wins.
info.helpText: Players choose seats. Press play button to begin. Sort cards in hand by pressing staggered line icon at bottom left. Click +2 button to add 2 cards to hand. Place card on playing area. Use arrow keys to move view around and eye button to recenter view. All players have the same view. Put discard in holder below seat.

fields.text: Do you want to recall all cards?

Select card types to use. 6 for 2 players, 8 for 3 player, 10 for 4 player. Players entering or leaving seats will cause selections to reset to defaults. Press confirm to recall all cards and deal 7 to each seated player.
